PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-19262008-12-12,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActNova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador Additional Fiscal Equalization Offset Payments Act
PrecisNOVA SCOTIA AND NEWFOUNDLAND AND LABRADOR ADDITIONAL FISCAL EQUALIZATION OFFSET PAYMENTS REGULATIONS. The regulatory action is required to administer the Equalization program, Territorial Formula Financing (TFF), and fiscal equalization offset payments to Nova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador. The regulatory amendments must come into force before the end of December 2008 to determine entitlements and make payments pursuant to the statutory authorities listed above.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0319 Publication Date: 2008-12-24
AttachmentsAttachment

The regulatory action is required to administer the Equalization program, Territorial Formula Financing (TFF), and fiscal equalization offset payments to Nova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador.   The regulatory amendments must come into force before the end of December 2008 to determine entitlements and make payments pursuant to the statutory authorities listed above.
